item.title: Perry Farrell Sues Jane’s Addiction Members Over 2024 Altercation Hours After They Sued Him
item.description: Farrell alleged the band attempted to to “undermine him by playing their instruments at a high volume so that he could not hear himself sing without blasting his own in-ear monitors at an unsafe level

item.title: Perry Farrell Sues Jane’s Addiction Members Over Onstage Fight, Just Hours After They Sued Him (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: The infamous September 2024 onstage altercation between Jane’s Addiction frontman Perry Farrell and other members of the band is far from over, as the two parties filed separate lawsuits on Wedn

item.title: Jane’s Addiction Members File $10 Million Lawsuit Against Perry Farrell Over 2024 Stage Altercation
item.description: “History will remember the band as suffering a swift and painful death at the hands of Farrell’s unprovoked anger and complete lack of self-control,” the suit said.
